SELECT data_time, area_code, area_name, sum(plan_count) as plan_count, sum(add_count) as add_count, sum(broadband_count) as broadband_count, round(sum(renewal_count)/sum(add_count),2) as renewal_rate, round(sum(flow_30_count)/sum(add_count),2) as flow_30_rate, round(sum(flow_20_count)/sum(add_count),2) as flow_20_rate, round(sum(assistant_count)/sum(add_count),2) as assistant_rate, round(sum(crm_count)/sum(add_count),2) as crm_rate, round(sum(add_count)/sum(plan_count)) as new_rate FROM tb_mk_2019_school_prom_report_list_hour WHERE data_time=(case when #{dataTime}=-1 then (select max(data_time) from tb_mk_2019_school_prom_report_list_hour) else CAST(to_char(to_date(#{dataTime}||'','yyyymmdd')::timestamp + '1 day','yyyymmdd')||'00' as bigint) end) and (case when #{isOpenData}='-1' then current_is_open is not null else current_is_open=#{isOpenData} end) and (case when #{authCode}='-1' then '-1'='-1' else trim(area_code)=#{authCode} end)
GROUP BY data_time, area_code, area_name ORDER BY area_code
